data.eml:eml: Description and revalidation of Mansonia (Mansonia) fonsecai (Pinto) (Diptera: Culicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barbosa, Andreia Aparecida, Silva, Mário Antônio Navarro Da, Sallum, Maria Anice Mureb (2005): Description and revalidation of Mansonia (Mansonia) fonsecai (Pinto) (Diptera: Culicidae). Zootaxa 905: 1-11, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170985
